Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>But even if we find the temple, our work
will not be done. There may be geoglyphs
located all over the world.
We must brace for a long, arduous search.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The ancient literature indicates the
<clr:0000>Forgotten Temple <clr:ffff>is here in Hebra—at
the bottom of the canyon.
Within that temple, Link, we believe we
can find the key to unlocking the mystery
of the geoglyphs.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There may be geoglyphs scattered all over
the world. We need to brace for a long,
arduous search.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, Link. We meet again.


Cado and I came here to see a geoglyph.
Sadly, we were thwarted by the blizzard
and grounded nearby.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>After it finally calmed down, we made our
way to this village.

We plan to get on with finding that
geoglyph shortly.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The ancient literature indicates the
<clr:0000>Forgotten Temple <clr:ffff>is here in Hebra—at
the bottom of the canyon.
We believe the temple holds the key to
unlocking the mystery of the geoglyphs.
